title: Study of mixed matrix membranes with in situ synthesized zeolite imidazolate frameworks (ZIF-8, ZIF-67) in polyethersulfone polymer for CO2/CH4 separation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27074-27085
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04400B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Aditya Jonnalagedda, Bhanu Vardhan Reddy Kuncharam
CO2/CH4 separation using fabricated ZIF-8, ZIF-67, in situ ZIF-8, in situ ZIF-67 and PES MMMs. Increase of crystallinity in membranes and increase in Tg was observed. Significant enhancement of CO2 permeability of MMMs was achieved.
